name: Computer Science
description: Comprehensive program covering algorithms, systems, and AI with strong industry connections.
requirements: Strong math background, programming experience preferred

name: Data Science
description: Interdisciplinary program combining computer science, statistics, and domain applications.

name: Artificial Intelligence
description: Advanced study of machine learning, neural networks, and intelligent systems.
requirements: Excellent math skills, programming proficiency required

name: Cognitive Science
description: Study of the mind and intelligence from computational, psychological, and philosophical perspectives.
requirements: Interest in interdisciplinary studies, no specific prerequisites
